name: Game.INC
description:
story:

you are a game developer who makes 3 different types of games : racing, platformer, and fps. you must find the correct combinations of story,graphics,gameplay and sounds

how to play: 

you will be given 3 different themes of games you must find the correct combinations out of 20 for story,graphics,gameplay, and sound.

for example lets say fps requires

3 story, 7 graphics. 4 gameplay, and 6 sounds
